page.title: 04School Journey
page.content:
I start to walk to school at{20 past {8.}It's not far to walk but we have to get there at half past 8. I say bye to my mum and unlock the big wooden door with a key. That door is quite heavy because it's an old one.Well the whole house is{very}old.There was a house on the site 800 years ago. Anyway I scuff down the gravel and I walk past the front of the house -{it's only a 3 {minute walk!}When I get to school I take my books inside. I have my own drawer so I put them in it. Then we go out to play till quarter to nine. We play with small cars sometimes or play running games. After we've been out one of the teachers clap their hands and we all line up to go into school.
{
